page.title: Image Sprites in Super Mario Bros. 3
page.description: Posted by Vitaly Friedman on July 30th, 1990

htmlText:
My name is Vitaly Friedman and I just finished playing a fantastic super-cool new game called Super Mario Bros 3.

As I was playing, I couldn't help but notice how fantastic all the costumes Mario and Luigi could wear. I had to know how the game designers engineered this. I dove deep into the making of the game and discovered something called an 'image sprite'.
